name: Mountain View Landscaping
description: Imagine that, huh? Yes, I owned a landscaping company at one point. My first year in business part time was in 2017, so I didn't have a website yet. The following year I had a 'coming soon' page for most of the season and finally in 2019-2020, I designed and deployed this new site. I was using a combination of other software to run and manage the business and customer relations so I figured I would start implementing some of the features I used most often into my own company website. It proved to be difficult to find time to work on the site when I had a million and one things going on with the business 34 hours a day, then add Covid-19 to the list of stresses. I ended up getting out of the business all together in July of 2020 to focus more on LBMS, which is my SaaS version of the software I was going to build for Mountain View.
